_header: Hail Gods Son of mights most
Subjects: Virgin Mary and Christ, song/prayers to
_description: A praising of Christ and the Virgin — thirteen 8-line stanzas with alternating refrains: ‘Beatus venter qui te portauit’ and ‘Beata vbera que suxisti’

Banna.First Lines:
Haill goddis sone of mychtis maistThat with þe glorius fader
                    began…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Syn deit for ws with visage wanBeatus venter qui te
                    portauit
